product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Better Than Naked Shorts pack great distance-ready features, such as ventilation and fast-drying fabric, into a lightweight pair of running shorts. Ripstop polyester is used to create soft and flowing outer shorts; polyester panels add to their breathability. Ventilation areas are positioned to reduce clamminess and vent warm air. A continuous seamless shorts liner made of polyester is wrapped into the waistband. FlashDry(TM) fibers in shorts liner dramatically improve dry time and breathability. UPF 50+ sun protection. No inseam on shorts means virtually no chafing while you run. Small pockets in the rear center of the waistband provide a place to carry energy gels or some cash. The North Face Better Than Naked Shorts feature reflective logos to increase your visibility in low light. Closeout.
